author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Tune selection of good tracks in view of forward tracks using mostly the new pixel detector

#### PR validation:

Tested using private code and during calibration of Run3 MC sample

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

No back porting is needed
title: Run3-alca156 Add studies relevant for tuning tracker cuts to go to forward regions
